name: render
description: Render is a unified cloud to build and run all your apps and websites with free TLS certificates, a global CDN, private networks, and automatic deployments from Git.

name: heroku
description: Heroku is a company that creates server software enabling deployment of web applications.

name: netlify
description: Netlify is both a hosting tool and a platform for building websites and web applications.

name: ngrok
description: ngrok is a globally distributed reverse proxy facing your web services running in any cloud or private network, or on your machine.

name: pythonanywhere
description: PythonAnywhere is a web hosting service that allows users to run web applications written in the Python programming language on remote servers.

name: vercel
description: Vercel is a cloud deployment platform that enables developers to deploy front-end applications and serverless functions with zero configuration.

name: o2switch
description: o2switch is a French web host.

name: cloudflare
description: Cloudflare is an American company providing content delivery network services, DDoS mitigation, internet security, and distributed domain name server services.
